properties.name: Name
properties.help: New image name.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Source
properties.help: OS disk source from the same region, including a virtual machine ID or name, OS disk blob URI, managed OS disk ID or name, or OS snapshot ID or name.

properties.name: DataDiskSources
properties.help: Space-separated list of data disk sources, including unmanaged blob URI, managed disk ID or name, or snapshot ID or name.

properties.name: HyperVGeneration
properties.help: The hypervisor generation of the Virtual Machine created from the image.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: OsDiskCaching
properties.help: Storage caching type for the image's OS disk.

properties.name: StorageSku
properties.help: The SKU of the storage account with which to create the VM image. Unused if source VM is specified.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: ZoneResilient
properties.help: Specifies whether an image is zone resilient or not. Default is false. Zone resilient images can be created only in regions that provide Zone Redundant Storage.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the image.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Expand
properties.help: The expand expression to apply on the operation.

properties.name: Add
properties.help: Add an object to a list of objects by specifying a path and key value pairs.  Example: --add property.listProperty <key=value, string or JSON string>.

properties.name: ForceString
properties.help: When using 'set' or 'add', preserve string literals instead of attempting to convert to JSON.

properties.name: Remove
properties.help: Remove a property or an element from a list.  Example: --remove property.list <indexToRemove> OR --remove propertyToRemove.

properties.name: Set
properties.help: Update an object by specifying a property path and value to set.  Example: --set property1.property2=<value>.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the image template.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: BuildTimeout
properties.help: The Maximum duration to wait while building the image template, in minutes. Default is 60.

properties.name: Defer
properties.help: Temporarily store the object in the local cache instead of sending to Azure. Use `az cache` commands to view/clear.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: Scripts
properties.help: Space-separated list of shell or powershell scripts to customize the image with. Each script must be a publicly accessible URL. Infers type of script from file extension ('.sh' or'.ps1') or from source type. More more customizer options and flexibility, see: 'az image template customizer add'.

properties.name: Checksum
properties.help: The SHA256 checksum of the Red Hat ISO image.

properties.name: ImageSource
properties.help: The base image to customize. Must be a valid platform image URN, platform image alias, Red Hat ISO image URI, managed image name/ID, or shared image version ID.

properties.name: ManagedImageDestinations
properties.help: Managed image output distributor information. Space-separated list of key-value pairs. E.g "image_1=westus2 image_2=westus". Each key is the name or resource ID of the managed image to be created. Each value is the location of the image.

properties.name: SharedImageDestinations
properties.help: Shared image gallery (sig) output distributor information. Space-separated list of key-value pairs. E.g "my_gallery_1/image_def_1=eastus,westus  my_gallery_2/image_def_2=uksouth,canadaeast,francesouth." Each key is the sig image definition ID or sig gallery name and sig image definition delimited by a "/". Each value is a comma-delimited list of replica locations.

properties.name: ForceString

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Created
properties.help: Wait until created with 'provisioningState' at 'Succeeded'.

properties.name: Custom
properties.help: Wait until the condition satisfies a custom JMESPath query. E.g. provisioningState!='InProgress', instanceView.statuses[?code=='PowerState/running'].

properties.name: Deleted
properties.help: Wait until deleted.

properties.name: Exists
properties.help: Wait until the resource exists.

properties.name: Interval
properties.help: Polling interval in seconds.

properties.name: Timeout
properties.help: Maximum wait in seconds.

properties.name: Updated
properties.help: Wait until updated with provisioningState at 'Succeeded'.

properties.name: CustomizerName
properties.help: Name of the customizer.

properties.name: Type
properties.help: Type of customizer to be added to the image template.

properties.name: Defer
properties.help: Temporarily store the object in the local cache instead of sending to Azure. Use `az cache` commands to view/clear.

properties.name: Subscription

properties.name: DestPath
properties.help: The absolute destination path where the file specified in --file-source will be downloaded to in the image.

properties.name: FileSource
properties.help: The URI of the file to be downloaded into the image. It can be a github link, SAS URI for Azure Storage, etc.

properties.name: ExitCodes
properties.help: Space-separated list of valid exit codes, as integers.

properties.name: InlineScript
properties.help: Space-separated list of inline script lines to customize the image with.

properties.name: ScriptUrl
properties.help: URL of script to customize the image with. The URL must be publicly accessible.

properties.name: RestartCheckCommand
properties.help: Command to verify that restart succeeded.

properties.name: RestartCommand
properties.help: Command to execute the restart operation.

properties.name: RestartTimeout
properties.help: Restart timeout specified as a string consisting of a magnitude and unit, e.g. '5m' (5 minutes) or '2h' (2 hours).

properties.name: ArtifactTags
properties.help: Tags that will be applied to the output artifact once it has been created by the distributor. space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: Defer

properties.name: OutputName
properties.help: Name of the image builder run output. Defaults to the name of the managed image or sig image definition.

properties.name: Subscription

properties.name: ManagedImage
properties.help: Name or ID of the customized managed image to be created.

properties.name: ManagedImageLocation
properties.help: Location where the customized image will be created. Defaults to resource group's location.

properties.name: GalleryImageDefinition
properties.help: Name or ID of the existing SIG image definition to create the customized image version with.

properties.name: GalleryName
properties.help: Shared image gallery name, if image definition name and not ID was provided.

properties.name: GalleryReplicationRegions
properties.help: Space-separated list of regions to replicate the image version into. Defaults to resource group's location.

properties.name: IsVhd
properties.help: The output is a VHD distributor.

commonTaskProperties.name: Debug
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity to show all debug logs.

commonTaskProperties.name: Help
commonTaskProperties.help: Show this help message and exit.

commonTaskProperties.name: Query
commonTaskProperties.help: JMESPath query string. See http://jmespath.org/ for more information and examples.

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity. Use --debug for full debug logs.
